00002 #
00003 #  Implement the list of allowed parentheses.
00004 #
00005 package Parser::Context::Parens;
00006 use strict;
00007 our @ISA = qw(Value::Context::Data);
00008 
00009 sub init {
00010   my $self = shift;
00011   $self->{dataName} = 'parens';
00012   $self->{name} = 'parenthesis';
00013   $self->{Name} = 'Parenthesis';
00014   $self->{namePattern} = qr/\S+/;
00015 }
00016 
00017 sub addToken {
00018   my $self = shift; my $token = shift;
00019   my $data = $self->{context}{$self->{dataName}}{$token};
00020   unless ($data->{hidden}) {
00021     $self->{tokens}{$token} = "open";
00022     $self->{tokens}{$data->{close}} = "close" unless $data->{close} eq $token;
00023   }
00024 }
00025 
00026 sub removeToken {
00027   my $self = shift; my $token = shift;
00028   my $data = $self->{context}{$self->{dataName}}{$token};
00029   delete $self->{tokens}{$token};
00030   delete $self->{tokens}{$data->{close}} unless $data->{hidden} || $data->{close} eq $token;
00031 }
00032 
00033 #
00034 #  Always retain 'start' since it si crucial to the parser
00035 #
00036 sub clear {
00037   my $self = shift;
00038   $self->SUPER::clear();
00039   $self->redefine('start');
00040 }
